name: Visual Tool Markup Language Document
summary: Learn about .VTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VTM files are used by Adobe Dreamweaver, and are also used by older programs, which include Adobe ColdFusion Studio, Macromedia HomeSite, and JRun Studio.

description: File created in the Visual Took Markup Language (VTML) format; enables developers to extend a program's user interface with new components; often used for defining functions for code hinting, completion, and formatting; also used for creating new language tags.
